channel.title: [First] just opens gimp

item.title: [First] just opens gimp
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You don’t need to put DeclareBMPS; in the main loop, and at the end you shouldn’t use the repeat, also you could use “FreeBitmap(bitmap : Integer);” to free the bitmap.

Read full topic

item.title: [First] just opens gimp
item.dc:creator: @syberium syberium
item.description:
@syberium wrote:

[scar] Program test;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
var
gimp:integer;
procedure DeclareBMPS;
begin
gimp := BitmapFromString(21, 13, ‘z78DAAD545B6E1C310CBB92DE’ +
‘B23EFDBCFF914ACF2C8234E8470B748D681DCFAC285294B5C7EEA’ +
‘E234E778BF41ED8BF275FE79FF8BEF9BFE2F86D8FFCB9CB514365’ +
‘7CCEED13BF57F2A76CA3136256FC13EEEAFA9D5D48D3AE753A579’ +
‘8A72067C5EC8C376797AFF77F664BCF4C0DE7587F8FEB14A78DEF’ +
‘E82640B45A358B5AB6D1CC3466B94E5F8DF4D8F68548A62872EAD’ +
‘6D4D2A5A2AA2E1B3195AD42104F6C359FCD7FD48CBDB598EDC489’ +
‘E5E70BFDEB296A8A8AD2D6921C15C9B290C56624C5A44382B6860’ +
‘82D253E3465F0A021CE8D4A889D1A77664A0EC489D29AED473D3C’ +
‘8AD51A7087EF1890577EA04361B3D835F063B18B3BE898DEA84B1’ +
‘2B189015D8568C9E405DC7C70F9C19D2C141CB4C8E85091F2E062’ +
‘8F484A4B64F6F1E06AA84F9BDFBC649F2E27FCD3EFF3245BEA0C9’ +
‘58138C097A8C07751BEAC5183314A93CE07FB23793B208E6E406C’ +
‘77A7DBB98080E0025B0506CA05D8CBA0BA37ABDFB83FE85E906E0’ +
‘C1967D6A881446D368D7D7D908CFF5707E931B1A3EAADE7CA864A’ +
‘2D8ECF170B8D432322826CBF1C815556BE1C02F87033F77038402’ +
‘F1A7A1355DB2567AF6DBBF6BE3F998E3DD658237BDB73F71DE7FD’ +
‘201D8C53581DD554CD1474331F5CF20D5E0DF9D95005F4BD49C0D’ +
‘38E41479C6C7868E3B483DAC2DED40CC555964EBAEB71B22203E6’ +
‘E9C881D02FECA537E3FD74BE6B813C0C72705561EC6EC10EAB23E’ +

‘335CA642D78EFAD19B3E7BEF05739CE1274F3B0DA6C062BF2BDA5’ +
‘DD73C137D854B4FD0A33090319909AC304C89625A312B47584282’ +
‘5106DC84B9812FEE07AEBB0BCA40E646B8B4122DB726F85B59AD3’ +
‘78905ABC8DCB71F33B2DF859AB0E087CCF9B09EF7AA04DBCB7A20’ +
‘2F418207171534D92CDC4518978A6E113D701F46C35E2A7C55407’ +
‘1F7A2BB0CC9679EEBA8C6A8C7107B047A23CD6BC36F0727036D48’ +
‘B8EBF86572BB3CD0CF86FBE8325F5097702FD1A32DE69587602A5’ +
‘50DDFD07DFD020EAF6D2C’);
end;

procedure ClickBMPS;
begin
wait(300+random(32))
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(32+random(16))
clickmouse(x,y,true)
end;

   Procedure FindBMPS;
   begin

if(FindBitmap(gimp,x,y))then
ClickBMPS;
end;
begin
repeat
wait(1300)
DeclareBMPS;
FindBMPS;
until(false)
end. [/scar]
